sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hydh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.hydh)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'交易代码输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jydm)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'业务量输入错误，只能输入:17位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.ywl)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.ywl,17,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'业务量输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.ywl)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMM!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMM')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=(select t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)'|| cast(f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) as char(8))||'!' as error from xtb_xtcs rq ,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') where cast(t.qsrq as integer)<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq ,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') and (error='' or error is null) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set error=error||'交易代码不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_hxjydm dm where rtrim(dm.jydm)=rtrim(t.jydm)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set error=error||'业务量不能是负数!' where cast(t.ywl as decimal(25,5))<0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.tjrq =( select cast(w.ym as char(8)) from csb_sjw w where w.tjrq=cast( t.tjrq||'01' as Integer) )where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error= t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)!' where t.tjrq<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq ,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS' ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGLR_HYSGYWL tar ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as DECIMAL(22,0))=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.jydm =tar.JYDM and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gysgywldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select tjrq,hydh,jydm from gysgywldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,hydh,jydm having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.hydh=dr.hydh and t.jydm=dr.jydm) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE gysgywldr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , jydm varchar(100) , jymc varchar(100) , ywl varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from gysgywldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from gysgywldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,jydm,jymc,ywl,khdxdh,error from gysgywldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,jydm,jymc,ywl,khdxdh,error from gysgywldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,jydm,jymc,ywl,khdxdh,error from gysgywldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_HYSGYWL(TJRQ,KHDXDH,JYDM,YWL,CZR,CZSJ) select cast (t.tjrq as DECIMAL(22,0)),KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH, t.jydm ,cast (t.ywl as DECIMAL(25,5)),'$login_hydh$',F_GET_SYSTIME() from gysgywldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHDX_HY0.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_HYSGYWL tar where exists(select 1 from gysgywldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as DECIMAL(22,0))=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.jydm=tar.JYDM and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
